wikipedia_page.main: Stephen James Lake Taylor, Baron Taylor (SJL Taylor) (30 December 1910 – 1 February 1988) was a British physician, civil servant, politician and educator.

response: * Stephen Taylor, Baron Taylor (1910–1988), the sixth Life Peer to be created (1958)
* Stephen Taylor, Baron Taylor of Harlow (1910–1988), British physician, civil servant, politician and educator
* Charity Taylor, pioneering prison governor, married to Stephen Taylor, Baron Taylor

List of elected British politicians who have changed party affiliation

response: She married the physician/politician Stephen Taylor, Baron Taylor of Harlow, Labour/SDP life peer in 1939.

Home Intelligence also undertook more detailed reports on particular subjects and used the semi-autonomous Wartime Social Survey unit to undertake sample surveys. This part of the division’s work was expanded under the guidance of Dr Stephen Taylor, Baron Taylor (who replaced Mary Adams as director in April 1941).Irving, Henry, ‘Plotting Morale in World War Two’, Being Human Festival, 15 Nov 2014. See http://www.moidigital.ac.uk/
